inlineScript: function onApply(game, parent) { var effect = parent.createEffect(); effect.getBonuses().addBaseWeaponBonus('Handaxe', 'CriticalMultiplier', 1); effect.getBonuses().addBaseWeaponBonus('Battleaxe', 'CriticalMultiplier', 1); effect.getBonuses().addBaseWeaponBonus('Waraxe', 'CriticalMultiplier', 1); effect.getBonuses().addBaseWeaponBonus('Greataxe', 'CriticalMultiplier', 1); parent.applyEffect(effect); }
name: Master Training, Axes
description: You do an additional 1x damage on critical hits with handaxes, battleaxes, waraxes, and greataxes.
